name: Vein Miner
author: Codex
description: Mine connected ore veins with one key-activated break.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.description: Master toggle for the vein miner behavior.

showMessages.label: Show Messages
showMessages.description: Show chat messages when activation or vein mining occurs.

activationWindowMs.label: Activation Window (ms)
activationWindowMs.description: How long after pressing the activation key the next mined tile can trigger vein mining.

maxVeinBlocks.label: Max Vein Blocks
maxVeinBlocks.description: Maximum connected blocks mined per activation, excluding the initial block.

useOreSet.label: Include All Ores
useOreSet.description: Automatically include all TileID.Sets.Ore blocks in the tile whitelist.

tileWhitelist.label: Extra Tile Whitelist
tileWhitelist.description: Comma-separated TileID names or numeric IDs to allow (for example: Hellstone, Chlorophyte, 22).

keybinds.label: Activate Vein Miner
keybinds.description: Arm vein mining for your next ore block break
